definition: the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the extraction process of polysaccharide from Atractylodes Poria soup.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究白朮茯苓湯總多糖的提取工藝。

sentences.english: Results Rhizoma atractylodis macrocephalae and Fructus Aurantii were identified by the TLC.
sentences.chinese: 結果薄層色譜法可以鑑別出白朮和枳殼。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the content of heavy metals in Actractylodes Macrocephala Koidz. (AMK).
sentences.chinese: 目的考察白朮藥材的重金屬含量情況。

sentences.english: Location of efferent neurons of caecum in fowl;
sentences.chinese: 探討白朮對雞離體空腸和盲腸運動張力的影響。

sentences.english: The effect of Atractylodes liposoluble components on small intestine movement function of mice was investigated, and its possible mechanism was explored.
sentences.chinese: 考察白朮脂溶性成分對小鼠胃腸功能的影響。

sentences.english: Conclusion The water-soluble extract of Baizhu is of low toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 結論白朮水提物屬於一種低毒性物質。

sentences.english: The research aimed to discuss the effect of atractylodes macrocephala on the tension of isolated jejunum and caecum of chook.
sentences.chinese: 探討白朮對雞離體空腸和盲腸運動張力的影響。
